messages.title: Glasgow North backs Katy Gordon
messages.content: More and more Glasgow North residents are backing Katy Gordon to be their next MP. They have been impressed by Katy's record of action locally here in Glasgow North.

messages.title: It's a clear choice on May 6th...
messages.content: ...between a Labour MP who won't stand up for you, or a Lib Dem MP who will put local people first.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems will make Britain a fairer place to live. We will cut the bills of those on middle and low incomes, to cut taxes by up to Â£700 will give real help to families everywhere.
We'll pay for these by closing the tax loopholes exploited by the very rich. But that's just the start. We'll take action to create jobs, tackle climate change and clean up politics.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A two horse race between Labour and Lib Dem.

issues.economy: The Lib Dems will make Britain a fairer place to live, by cutting bills and closing tax loopholes.
issues.environment: Take action to create jobs, tackle climate change.

images.caption: Graphical representation of the 2005 General Election Results showing Labour at 39%, Lib Dem at 27%, SNP at 13%, and others.
Candidate Katy Gordon speaking with a constituent.
